issues.description: The method intended to clear the stock inventory is named 'emptyStock' in the problem statement and solution repository, but it is named 'clearInventory' in the template repository. This discrepancy could confuse students who are trying to map the required implementation from the problem statement to the existing template code, leading to uncertainty about which name to use or modify.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the method in the template repository from 'clearInventory' to 'emptyStock' to ensure consistent naming across all artifacts, helping students directly map the problem requirements to the code without additional cognitive effort.
